Description: Limestone ostracon: on the recto a sketch drawing for a stela dedicated to the goddess Anuket by the deputy foreman Hay. On the verso four vertical lines of hieroglyphic text giving the family-line of the dedicator.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: K.Kitchen, 'Ramesside Inscriptions' VII (Oxford 1989), 319-20; D.Valbelle, ‘Bulletin de l’Institut Français d’Archéologie Orientale’ 75 (Cairo, 1975), pp.134-8, with figs 6a-b; 'idem','Satis et Anoukis' (Mainz 1981), pp.29ff.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395075) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395075)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
